Title: Login with valid username and password
Expected Result: User is able to login and can view Products page
Steps:
1. Enter valid username(e.g standard_user)
  2. Enter valid password(e.g secret_sauce)
  3. Click on "Login" button

Title: Login with valid username and invalid password
Expected Result:
Gives error message "Username and password does not match any user in this service"

Username and password do not match any user in this servi

Username and password do not match any user in this ser"
Steps:
1. Enter valid username
  2. Enter invalid password
  3. Click Login

Title: Login with invalid username and valid password
Expected Result: Gives error message "Username and password does not match any user in this service"
Steps:
1. Enter invalid username
  2. Enter valid password(secret_sauce)
  3. Click Login

Title: Enter invalid username and invalid password
Expected Result: Gives error message "Username and password does not match any user in this service"
Steps:
1. Enter invalid username
  2. Enter invalid password
  3. Click Login

Title: Special characters in username and password field
Expected Result: Gives error message "Username and password does not match any user in this service"
Steps:
1. Enter special characters in username field (e.g @@@@ __)
  2. Enter special characters in password field (e.g $$$%%)
  3. Click Login

Title: Leave Username field blank
Expected Result: Gives error message "Username is required"
Steps:
1. Leave the username field blank
  2. Enter valid password
  3. Click on login button

Title: Leave Password field blank
Expected Result: Gives error message "Password is required"
Steps:
1. Enter valid username
  2. Leave password field blank
  3. Click on Login button

Title: Leave both username and password field blank
Expected Result: Gives error message "username is required"
Steps:
1. Leave username field blank
  2. Leave password field blank
  3. Click on Login button

Title: Login with locked out user
Expected Result: Page should give error message "Sorry, this user has been locked out"
Steps:
1. Enter username (locked_out_user)
  2. Enter Password (secret_sauce)
  3. Click on Login button

Title: Product Filtering - Name(A to Z)
Expected Result: Products should be sorted alphabetically from A to Z
Steps:
1. Open filter dropdown
  2. Select "Name (A to Z)"
  3. Observe Product Order

Title: Product Filtering - Name(Z to A)
Expected Result: Products should be sorted alphabetically from Z to A.
Steps:
1. Open filter dropdown
  2. Select Name(Z to A)
  3. Observe Product Order

Title: Product Filtering - Price(low to high)
Expected Result: Products should be filtered from prices low to high
Steps:
1. Open filter dropdown
  2. Select "Price(low to high)"
  3. Observe product order

Title: Product Filtering - Price(high to low)
Expected Result: Products sorted from prices high to low
Steps:
1. Open filter dropdown
  2. Select "Price(high to low)"
  3. Observe Product order

Title: Verify product details page displays all mandatory fields.
Expected Result: Product details and description and as pe requirements
Steps:
1. Click on Prodct
  2. Verify product details and description

Title: Verify ""Add to Cart"" functionality
Expected Result: Product is added to "Your Cart"
Steps:
1. Click on Product
  2. Click on "Add to Cart" button below price
  3. Check if product added to cart

Title: Remove product from cart
Expected Result: Selected product is removed from "Your Cart"
Steps:
1. Click on the Cart icon at the top right corner
  2. Click on "Remove" button of the product you want to remove from cart

Title: Verify Checkout funtionality
Expected Result:
1. A message will be displayed "Thank you for your order!"
  2. "Back Home" button will be available
Steps:
1. Click on "Checkout" button at the bottom right of the page
  2. Fill information necessary for product delivery
  3. Click on "Continue" button at the bottom right
  4. At the "Checkout Overview" page click on "Finish" at the bottom right

Title: Verify ""Checkout"" with empty cart
Expected Result: Error message is displayed "Cart is empty"
Steps: 1. Click on "Checkout" button at the bottom right

Title: Verify ""Checkout Your Information"" with valid inputs
Expected Result: Website accepts input and takes user to next "Checkout Overview" section
Steps:
1. Enter valid First Name and Last name
  2. Enter valid zip/postal code
  3. Click on "Continue" at the bottom right

Title: Enter invalid input in ""Checkout Your Information""
Expected Result: Error message is displayed "Invalid characters"
Steps:
1. Enter special characters in "First Name", "Last Name" and "zip/postal code" field.
  2. Click on "Continue" button at the bottom right

Title: Leave ""First Name"" field blank in ""Checkout: Your Information""
Expected Result: Error message is displayed "First Name is required"
Steps:
1. Leave "First Name" blank
  2. Enter valid input for "Last Name" and "zip/postal code"
  3. Click on "Continue" at the bottom right

Title: Leave ""Last Name"" field blank in ""Checkout: Your Information""
Expected Result: Error Message is displayed "Last Name is required"
Steps:
1. Enter valid "First Name"
  2. Leave "Last Name" field blank
  3. Enter valid "zip/postal code"
  4. Click on "Continue" button at the bottom right

Title: Leave ""zip/postal code"" field blank in ""Checkout: Your Information"" page
Expected Result: Error Message is diaplayed "zip/postal code is required"
Steps:
1. Enter valid "First Name" and "Last Name"
  2. Leave "zip/postal code" field blank
  3. Click on "Continue" button at the bottom right

Title: All Buttons Visible and Clickable
Expected Result: All buttons work properly and perform their functionality
Steps:
1. Click on all the buttons (e.g Login button, add to cart, Continue, Cart)
  2. Observe the changes

Title: Images Loading Correctly
Expected Result: All products images load correctly
Steps:
1. Check if all product images load correctly
  2. Check if product images represent the exact product

Title: Consistent fonts, colors, spacing
Expected Result: Website have consistent fonts, colors and spacing
Steps: Check the font and spacing of the Website

Title: Menu/Sidebar open or close
Expected Result: Sidebar/Menu open and close as intended
Steps:
1. Click on the sidebar icon at the top left corner
  2. Click on the sidebar icon again when it is already open to close it

Title: Scroll Behaviour
Expected Result: Website should be responsive to scrolling and scrolling should be smooth
Steps: 1. Scroll up and down on website

Title: Responsive behaviour(browser resize)
Expected Result:
1. UI adjusts automatically
  2. No overlapping element
  3. All buttons remain usable
Steps:
1. On products page resize the browser window(full screen, half screen, narrow screen)
  2. Observe UI behaviour
